name: Cupid Crossing
description:
A Simple Puzzle Aracde Game for the Extra Credits Game Jam with the theme of Connect.

Play as Cupid helping people look for their one true love by matching people with similar interests!

Made using Unity and with art assets from Kenney @ https://www.kenney.nl/.
Particularly from Roguelike Characters, RPG Urban Pack, Roguelike Modern City, Emotes Pack.

The Faune typeface was also used in this game, it was created by Alice Savoie in the context of a commission by the Centre National des Arts Plastiques in partnership with the Groupe Imprimerie Nationale.
